summary:
- **Announcement Type**: New securities issuance under existing ATM Facility  
- **Total Shares Issued**: 1,020,078 ordinary shares (20,078 at AUD 0.195; 1,000,000 at AUD 0.165)  
- **Purpose**: Working capital  
- **Issued Capital Post-Quotation**: 235,174,337 ordinary shares (quoted) + unquoted options/warrants (details in doc)  
- **Approval**: Issued under 15% placement capacity (no shareholder approval required)  

*No material valuation/liquidity impacts beyond dilution from issuance.*
